Class AnimatedThing

java.lang.Object
  AnimatedThing
Direct Known Subclasses:
BlueFly, BlueShot, Gnat, SmallFly, Wasp
public abstract class AnimatedThing
extends java.lang.Object

Overview: Handles the animation of bugs

Author:
Jonathan Chandler, James Liu
